title: Looking to upgrade my Frill & Jim Delehanty
author: Scott L.

posts.post_title: Looking to upgrade my Frill & Jim Delehanty
posts.post_content:
2-5. PSA or SGC. PM or email with pics and price. 

Thanks. 

Scott
Some decent looking Delehanty on Ebay, although I know you would rather deal with a member here.

Hey Randy

It seems like the nice ones on eBay are Frank. I’m looking for a Jim. Shoot me a pm if you see one. Could have missed it in my search. Thanks!
